tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE nanostructures (
    nanostructure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    size FLOAT,
    shape VARCHAR(50),
    composition VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE nanostructures_sizes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    width FLOAT,
    height FLOAT,
    depth FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE nanostructures_shapes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    shape_type VARCHAR(50),
    dimensionality INT
)

CREATE TABLE nanostructures_composition (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    material VARCHAR(50),
    density FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE nanostructures_info (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    structure_id INT,
    size_id INT,
    shape_id INT,
    composition_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE Nanostructure_Size (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  length FLOAT,
  width FLOAT,
  height FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Nanostructure_Shape (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  nanostructure_id INT,
  shape VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (nanostructure_id) REFERENCES Nanostructure_Size(id)
)

CREATE TABLE Nanostructure_Composition (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  nanostructure_id INT,
  material VARCHAR(50),
  composition TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (nanostructure_id) REFERENCES Nanostructure_Size(id)
)

CREATE TABLE Nanostructure_Information (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  nanostructure_id INT,
  description TEXT,
  source VARCHAR(100),
  FOREIGN KEY (nanostructure_id) REFERENCES Nanostructure_Size(id)
)

CREATE TABLE Nanostructure_Comparison (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  nanostructure_1_id INT,
  nanostructure_2_id INT,
  comparison_result TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (nanostructure_1_id) REFERENCES Nanostructure_Size(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (nanostructure_2_id) REFERENCES Nanostructure_Size(id)
)
